properties.name: jwt.secret
properties.description: Secret for generating and checking JWTs.

properties.name: moodle.apiUser
properties.description: Moodle account username for use with the api.

properties.name: moodle.apiPassword
properties.description: Moodle account password for use with the api.

properties.name: resourceStorage.resourceExpiration
properties.description: Expiration time for resources stored in the database (in seconds).

properties.name: vtdebug.originalExceptionInPayload
properties.description: If the error api responses should contain the original exception (for debugging purposes).

properties.name: vtdebug.resetAccountTable
properties.description: Clear the account table and add a single admin account on every start.
